projects.title: BlockLang Browser Extension
projects.description: A powerful browser extension for Chrome, Firefox, and Safari that helps users filter unwanted content and remove distracting websites from search results.
projects.longDescription: BlockLang is a comprehensive browser extension designed to improve the browsing experience by filtering out unwanted content and distracting websites. The extension features advanced filtering capabilities, multi-language support, and cross-platform compatibility.
features: Built using vanilla JavaScript for maximum compatibility across all browsers
Utilizes Web Extensions API for unified development across Chrome, Firefox, and Safari
Implements content filtering algorithms using DOM manipulation and CSS selectors
Uses browser storage APIs for saving user preferences and blocked domains
Employs manifest.json configuration for defining extension permissions and behavior
Integrates with browser tabs API to monitor and filter web content in real-time
Implements cross-platform compatibility through browser-specific manifest versions
Uses background scripts for persistent filtering and performance optimization
descriptions: Cross-platform browser support (Safari iOS iPhone over 5 incs)
Cross-platform browser support (Safari iOS iPhone 5 incs)

projects.title: Body-Language.org Website
projects.description: A comprehensive website dedicated to body language education and analysis, featuring interactive content and educational resources.
projects.longDescription: Body-Language.org is an educational platform that provides comprehensive information about non-verbal communication, body language interpretation, and social interaction skills. The website features interactive elements, detailed guides, and practical examples.
features: Developed with PHP 7.4+ using object-oriented programming principles
MySQL database with normalized schema for efficient data storage and retrieval
Implements responsive design using Bootstrap 5 framework for mobile compatibility
Uses jQuery and vanilla JavaScript for dynamic user interface interactions
Employs PHP sessions and authentication system for secure user management
Integrates multilingual support through PHP internationalization functions
Implements CRUD operations with prepared statements for SQL injection prevention
Uses CSS3 animations and transitions for enhanced user experience
Employs MVC architecture pattern for clean code organization and maintainability
descriptions: Multi-column data tables for various data types
Simplified data display system for small datasets
Admin panel with user management capabilities
Role management system with admin privileges
